entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
